text:
(1)
Broadway (running from right to left) north from but not including West 253rd Street to about Mosholu Ave., showing excavation work at the S.W. corner of West 254th Street on the new Henry Hudson Parkway. On the east side of Broadway is Van Cortlandt Park.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Another view of the S.W. corner of Broadway and West 254th Street. On this site now (1937) stands the Henry Hudson Parkway Bridge which spans Broadway.

April 23, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Broadway (running from right to left) north from but not including West 253rd Street to about Mosholu Ave., showing excavation work at the S.W. corner of West 254th Street on the new Henry Hudson Parkway. On the east side of Broadway is Van Cortlandt Park.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Another view of the S.W. corner of Broadway and West 254th Street. On this site now (1937) stands the Henry Hudson Parkway Bridge which spans Broadway.

April 23, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

Broadway, east side, between West 253rd and 254th Streets (viewed northward), within Van Cortlandt Park, showing the site upon which was erected, later in the year, the Henry Hudson Parkway Bridge which spans Broadway.

April 23, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Broadway, west side, south from but not including West 254th Street, showing excavation work in progress for the construction of the Henry Hudson Parkway Bridge which now straddles Broadway.
April 23, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, at a later date, showing the bridge between West 254th and 253rd Streets.
July 18, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Broadway, west side, south from but not including West 254th Street, showing excavation work in progress for the construction of the Henry Hudson Parkway Bridge which now straddles Broadway.
April 23, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, at a later date, showing the bridge between West 254th and 253rd Streets.
July 18, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Van Cortlandt Park: A view southeastward from Broadway at West 254th Street, showing the site of the Henry Hudson Parkway.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same area as seen from West 253rd Street. The view is more directly eastward.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

(1)
Van Cortlandt Park: A view southeastward from Broadway at West 254th Street, showing the site of the Henry Hudson Parkway.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same area as seen from West 253rd Street. The view is more directly eastward.
April 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

Henry Hudson Parkway (left), west from Broadway. This lane is in direct contact with Broadway, while the main driveway is slightly south of it, crossing Broadway over a bridge. On the right is seen West 254th Street.

April 24, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.
